title: Best car manufacturers based on build quality in Great Britain ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
The Percentage score is highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus has 1.06 times more Percentage score than Automobile Manufacturers Toyota which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
The Percentage score is appeared to be the highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Automobile Manufacturers, and Percentage score in each Automobile Manufacturers on the y axis.
The Percentage score is highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Automobile Manufacturers in the x axis and Percentage score in the y axis.
The Percentage score is appeared to be the highest at Automobile Manufacturers Lexus and lowest at Automobile Manufacturers Toyota.
The second highest Percentage score is appeared to be the Automobile Manufacturers Porsche.
Automobile Manufacturers Toyota has 1.06 times less Percentage score than Automobile Manufacturers Lexus which is the highest.
Automobile Manufacturers Lexus is higher than any other Automobile Manufacturerss with value 94.27, followed by Porsche, and Audi. Down to Automobile Manufacturers Toyota with the lowest value 88.85.
The highest value 94.27 at Lexus is almost 1.03 times larger than the average value 91.71.
The Percentage score is 1375.61 if we add up values of all Automobile Manufacturerss.
